Title: Using GPS and implementing an emergency communications system on school buses
Summary: Requires the commissioner of motor vehicles, in consultation with the commissioner of education, to promulgate rules and regulations to implement GPS and an emergency communications system on school buses.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L; amd ยง305, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the education law, in relation to using GPS and implementing an emergency communications system on school buses
